text: Feldgrau is a greenish-gray color. In World War I, the color feldgrau was a light gray-green, though there were variations of the shade ranging from grays to browns. The shade is called light feldgrau. == History == In 1907, the so- called feldgrau peace uniform with colored cuffs, facings, shoulder straps and gorgets was issued by decree in Prussia. == Related pages == * Eigengrau * Blue-gray * Glaucous Category:Shades of green
title: Feldgrau
